actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide certain reduced rate rail, air, and urban and rural mass transportation for persons 65 years of age or older.
short_title: Senior Citizen Reduced Rate Transportation Act

summary.text: Senior Citizens Reduced Rate Transportation Act - Prohibits specified Federal financial assistance to railroads, airlines, and mass transportation systems unless such carriers provide transportation at a reduced rate for persons sixty-five years of age and older.

titles.title: Senior Citizen Reduced Rate Transportation Act
A bill to provide certain reduced rate rail, air, and urban and rural mass transportation for persons 65 years of age or older.
